contexts.context: ...Stadt Zengg (civitatem nostram Segniensem) angefallen et <mark>more</mark> hostili depopulato eius agro non minori sevitia, quam...
...with a not inconsiderable number of German soldiers et <mark>more</mark> hostili depopulato eius agro non minori sevitia, quam...
...about these things and asked him to tell him <mark>more</mark>.
